text: Ara yadi duhkha-dain'ya sparsa karara para amara take amara paksa theke anugrahera asbadana de'i, takhana se abasya'i bale thake, 'e amara prapya ebam ami mane kari na ye, kiyamata sanghatita habe. Ara yadi amake amara rabera kache phiriye neya'o haya, tabu'o tamra kache amara jan'ya kalyana'i thakabe.' Ata'eba, amara abasya'i kaphiraderake tadera amala sambandhe abahita karaba ebam taderake abasya'i asbadana karaba kathora sasti
